doc.str: Method for deodorizing and refreshing for dry cleaning and dry cleaning apparatus using such method

The present invention provides a method for deodorizing and refreshing petroleum group solvent used in a dry cleaning apparatus, and a dry cleaning apparatus using such a method, which can maintain the circulating solvent in a fresh condition for a long time, eliminate a bad smell of the solvent, provide highly stable cleaning ability and good cleaning finish, and prevent ignition and explosion of the solvent to ensure safety. In the dry cleaning apparatus, the petroleum group solvent in a solvent storage tank 2 is pumped by a circulating pump 5, is supplied to a cleaning bath 8 through a filter 6 and carbon absorbent 7 and then is returned from the cleaning bath 8 to the solvent storage tank 2 through a button trap 3, and an ozone generating device 10 is provided for generating ozone gas and a diffuser 11 for pouring the ozone gas produced by the ozone generating device 10 into the petroleum group solvent as fine bubbles are arranged to be contacted with a bottom surface of the solvent storage tank 2 or the button trap 3. | 本发明提供了除臭和清新的石油集团溶剂的干洗设备所使用的方法，以及干洗设备使用该方法，可以保持在一个新鲜的循环溶剂很长一段时间，消除不良气味溶剂，提供高稳定的清洁能力以及良好的清洗完成，防止点火和溶剂，以确保安全爆炸。在干洗设备，石油集团溶剂在溶剂储罐二是由循环泵5抽，是通过一个过滤器提供6和碳吸收7至8清洁浴缸，然后从清洁浴8返回溶剂储罐通过一个按钮陷阱3和臭氧发生装置10 2提供产生臭氧气体和一个浇筑的臭氧气体的臭氧发生装置产生10到石油集团的优良泡沫安排在溶剂扩散11接触的和溶剂储罐2或按钮陷阱3底部表面。

DATABASE WPI Section Ch, Week 9427, Derwent Publications Ltd., London, GB; Class F, AN 94-2206628 & JP-A-6 154 478 (NOGUCHI) 3 June 1994 | PATENT ABSTRACTS OF JAPAN vol. 16, no. 265 (C-0951) 16 June 1992 & JP-A-04 064 395 (SHIGEO NAKAMURA) 28 February 1992
